text: Eduard Heger (; born 3 May 1976) is a Slovak politician. He has been the Prime Minister of Slovakia from 1 April 2021 to 15 May 2023. Before, he was the deputy prime minister and minister of Finance in the cabinet of Igor Matovič. Heger is a member of Democrats since 2023, before he was the member of Ordinary People and Independent Personalities (OĽaNO). ==References== Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Prime Ministers of Slovakia Category:Current national leaders
title: Eduard Heger
